author: ET Online
title: 4 must-reads of ET Wealth: How serious investors can generate wealth, 6 stocks with up to 52% upside potential & more
description: A rundown of the four most important stories from ET Wealth this week.
content:
Here is a curated list of the best ET Wealth stories of the week. We look at how serious investors can generate wealth, how PEG ratio can help you pick good stocks, a divorce checklist for men and this week's stock pick. 


1) 
What serious investors who wish to generate wealth will have to doFresh news has the same level of utility for investors as decades old news. Guess what that level is, says Dhirendra Kumar of Value Research.


2) 
PEG ratio can help in selecting good stocks: These 6 stocks have upside potential of up to 52%PEG ratio can prove handy in selecting good stocks as it refines the valuations revealed by standard PE metric by including the estimated earnings growth.


3) 
12 pre-divorce moves for a harassed husbandHere is a list of 12 must-do things in divorce that men should never overlook.


4) 
Cyient's growth levers are in place: Why it is this week's stock pick
Most of Cyient's business verticals are poised for growth in this fiscal year. The company has also won five large deals with a total contract potential of $105.2 million in the second quarter.

author: By STAN CHOE, DAMIAN J. TROISE and ALEX VEIGA, AP Business Writers
title: Wall Street rally marks first weekly win streak since summer
description:
Technology stocks led a broad rally on Wall Street Friday, capping another strong week for the market, as investors welcomed solid profits from Apple and other companies.
The S&P 500 rose 2.5% and posted its first back-to-back weekly gains since August. The D…
